name: SWORN
description:
SWORN is an online, class-based action game in which players can compete and co-operate across a variety of modes.Features
  • Fast paced real-time action combat, with MOBA influences
  • Class based character system
  • Customise your character loadout with Cards for abilities, items and talents
  • Play in PVP, PVE and Co-op modes
  • Rank progression system and rewards
  • Low poly fantasy art style

The game is currently in a pre-alpha state, and as such many features are still being actively designed and developed.
